Room.Name: Entrance to Grandstand
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing in the back of the Grandstand, your ticket to excitement!
Room.LongDescription: The Grandstand is the place where people go to watch the main attractions at the carnival. Many amazing acts of breathtaking beauty are performed by skilled trapeze artists. Acrobats entertain with their funny antics. Dancing elephants prance around with surprising grace while tiger and lion tamers risk life and limb showing off with their animals. Be sure to visit the concession stand if you get an urge for food and drink. Go west if you want to get to the grandstand. Food and drink is to the east. South is the entrance to the Carnival. But wherever you go, remember to enjoy the show!
